title: Handle Fair Housing Complaint Inquiry
description: An applicant who was denied housing calls, claiming discrimination. The manager must handle the call according to policy.

tasks.description: Listen to the complaint without admitting fault and express empathy.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent maintains a professional and calm demeanor while acknowledging the caller's frustration.

tasks.description: Retrieve the applicant's file and the documented, non-discriminatory reason for their denial (e.g., poor credit score).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent pulls up the application file and confirms the denial was based on standard rental criteria.

tasks.description: Escalate the call to the brokerage's legal counsel or senior manager and document the incident.
tasks.expected_outcome: The agent does not attempt to resolve the legal complaint themselves but escalates it to the proper channel and creates a detailed incident report.
